name: cookie
description: Provides a simple API for interacting with cookies, including the creation and manipulation of subcookies.
author: nzakas

examples.name: cookie-simple-example
examples.description: Demonstrates basic usage of the Cookie utility for reading and writing cookies.

examples.name: cookie-advanced-example
examples.description: Demonstrates using the Cookie utility to get, set and remove cookies.

examples.name: cookie-subcookie-example
examples.description: Demonstrates using the Cookie utility to get and set subcookies.
